description:
The Swing Shift caresses the skin with the finest beechwood fibre in 2Undr's signature Modal fabric. Pure heavenly softness. Perfection in your pants.
Constructed with premium fabrics, the patented Joey Pouch® delivers the perfect fit while preventing unwanted skin contact. The pouch also delivers improved air flow keeping you cool when involved in strenuous activity or simply going about a busy day.
name: 2Undr Swing Shift Boxer Briefs, 6" Inseam - Print - 2-Pack - Mens
